text: Irwin Mark Jacobs (born October 18, 1933) is an American electrical engineer and billionaire. He is a co-founder and former chairman of Qualcomm. He is a chair of the board of trustees of the Salk Institute. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Engineers from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Scientists from Massachusetts
title: Irwin M. Jacobs
